summary: Bard Follower that can play instrument anywhere.
descriptionHtml:
Lycel Warbard
Â 
A bard follower that can play instrument anywhere.

[b]Bow Skills[/b]
FireArrow(15% chance)
IceArrow(15% chance)
LightningArrow(5% chance when not raining else 75% outside only)
Detect(can see enemies similar to aura whisper)

Visiting her friend fyra ignis and lydia in breezehome.

[b]Must do first: [/b]uninstall first the older version and open game save, then install.

[b]V1.0.3
[/b]Added: Can sing tale of tounge
Added: Can sing dragonbon comes
Added: Can sing ragnar the red
Added: Sneak gameplay (if player is sneaking and not detected or enemy is searching for player)
Fixed: Drum loop
Fixed: Lycel will not applaud or drink when another npc bard sing

[b]V1.0.2
[/b]Added: Get naked.
Added: Can eqiup any clothes without getting naked.
Added: When using detect lycel have glow eyes effect.
Change: open inventory/follow/wait/dismiss are in command dialogue.

[b]V1.0.1
[/b]Added: Dialogue for show stats.
Added: Show/Hide instrument.

Note:
While playing instrument she will not teleport if fast travel or change location, use wait until you see her.

[b]Required[/b]
Skyrim
SKSE(not really needed i think, try it if problem exist)
32xp maximum skeleton
Hdt physics extension

[b]Used files to create this[/b]
32xp maximum skeleton
Hdt physics
Sg female textures renewal
Ks hairdos
Unpb blessed body
author: Silent Rue
